short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat to the Max -- but better

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Changes the interface of Chat To The Max and MIS Portal for easier use (only for Cricket Wireless Dealers)

Adds timestamps to each message, creates new message notification sounds, and moves the "you are now chatting with [agent]" to the bottom of the page for easier access.

v1.0.8 CHANGES:
* Added support for Aktivate!!!
* Added Random IMEI generator to Aktivate's header for BYOD sales
* When clicking "Verify" on Aktivate with someone's phone number input, automatically copies that phone number to clipboard for later use
* Fixed some syntax errors

v1.0.7 CHANGES:
* Fixed some bugs
* Gave the extension access to all domains in order to create alerts (only on active tabs, to remind users to complete the store checklist on MIS Portal)

v1.0.6 CHANGES:
* Fixed major bugs for jacqueb.c1.biz domain caused by improper coding

v1.0.5 CHANGES:
* Fixed some dark mode bugs
* Expanded support for dark mode to ALL Mobilelink sites, not just MIS
* Expanded support for dark mode to Rackspace Webmail (buggy and sometimes causes page crashes, enable through settings)

v1.0.4 CHANGES:
* Added Dark Mode!
* Added support for Exceed (cricketshout.exceedlms.com)

v1.0.1 - v1.0.3 CHANGES:
* Fixed minor bugs

v1.0.0 CHANGES: (First Big Update)
* Now fully working on MIS Portal, instead of focusing specifically on Chat to the Max
* Auto-select feature for checkbox inputs on opening/closing checklist
* Auto-select feature for store location input on opening/closing checklist
* Added user information messages for easier use, such as "Turn off the Auto-Check option by clicking here" on opening/closing checklist
* Fixed some background bugs

v0.3.6 CHANGES:
* Fixed bugs on MIS Portal
* Fixed other minor bugs

v0.3.5 CHANGES:
* Added SOME support for MIS Portal
* Tweaked some cosmetics

v0.2.0 - v0.3.4 CHANGES:
* Fixed minor bugs

v0.1.1 CHANGES:
* Fixed minor bugs

v0.0.6 - v0.1.0 CHANGES:
* Fixed LOTS of bugs on the settings page
* Fixed minor performance bugs caused by too many "for loops"

v0.0.5 CHANGES:
* Fixed minor bugs

v0.0.4 CHANGES:
* Fixed minor bugs

v0.0.3 CHANGES:
* Added audio support
* Fixed minor bugs

v0.0.2 CHANGES:
* Made timestamps prettier
